name: SpellHell
description:
As every year, adepts of magic gather to select one from among them who will be ascended by the council. Survive 5 rounds in the arena using the magic of Harmony and Chaos to win!

SpellHell is fast-paced top-down roguelite game where you fight with other mages. After every successful round, you will have a chance to upgrade on of your wielding powers - Harmony and Chaos . Be careful though, the other mages are also improving.

Features:
  • Advanced AI capable of avoiding threats, keeping a distance or dashing
  • Unique mana system, where using one spell generates a resource for another
  • 12 upgrades changing behaviour and effects of your spells
